languages.text: {n}Усмехнувшись, змей склоняется к вам.{/n} "О, мы полны достоинства. Смерть — слишком редкое и изысканое событие, что случается лишь раз в жизни. Лишь глупец будет страшиться и избегать ее мыслями".

{n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "Oh yeah, we're really dignified. Death is a rare and exquisite event that only happens once in your life. Only an idiot would fear it and avoid thinking about it."
languages.original_text: {n}Усмехнувшись, змей склоняется к вам.{/n} "О, мы полны достоинства. Смерть — слишком редкое и изысканое событие, что случается лишь раз в жизни. Лишь глупец будет страшиться и избегать ее мыслями".

languages.text: {n}蛇人大笑起来，朝你靠了过来。{/n}“噢，是啊，我们真的很有尊严。死亡是件罕见而微妙的事情，每个人一辈子只能死一次。只有白痴才会惧怕死亡，不肯思考它的意义。”
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "Oh yeah, we're really dignified. Death is a rare and exquisite event that only happens once in your life. Only an idiot would fear it and avoid thinking about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}蛇人大笑起来，朝你靠了过来。{/n}“噢，是啊，我们真的很有尊严。死亡是件罕见而微妙的事情，每个人一辈子只能死一次。只有白痴才会惧怕死亡，不肯思考它的意义。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}La serpiente se ríe y se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «Sí, claro, muy dignos. La muerte es un suceso exquisito y singular que solo se vive una vez. Solo un idiota le tendría miedo y evitaría pensar en ella».
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "Oh yeah, we're really dignified. Death is a rare and exquisite event that only happens once in your life. Only an idiot would fear it and avoid thinking about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}La serpiente se ríe y se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «Sí, claro, muy dignos. La muerte es un suceso exquisito y singular que solo se vive una vez. Solo un idiota le tendría miedo y evitaría pensar en ella».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}蛇は笑い、前のめりになった。{/n}「ああ、実に高貴だ。死は人生に一度しか訪れない、稀で極上の出来事だ。そんなもののことを考えて恐れるのは愚かでしかない」
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "Oh yeah, we're really dignified. Death is a rare and exquisite event that only happens once in your life. Only an idiot would fear it and avoid thinking about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}蛇は笑い、前のめりになった。{/n}「ああ、実に高貴だ。死は人生に一度しか訪れない、稀で極上の出来事だ。そんなもののことを考えて恐れるのは愚かでしかない」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Die Schlange lacht und beugt sich zu dir vor.{/n} "Oh ja, wir sind wirklich überaus würdevoll. Der Tod ist ein seltenes und exquisites Ereignis, das nur einmal im Leben eintritt. Nur in Narr würde ihn fürchten und es vermeiden, über ihn nachzudenken."
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "Oh yeah, we're really dignified. Death is a rare and exquisite event that only happens once in your life. Only an idiot would fear it and avoid thinking about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Schlange lacht und beugt sich zu dir vor.{/n} "Oh ja, wir sind wirklich überaus würdevoll. Der Tod ist ein seltenes und exquisites Ereignis, das nur einmal im Leben eintritt. Nur in Narr würde ihn fürchten und es vermeiden, über ihn nachzudenken."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Le serpent rit et se penche vers vous.{/n} « Oh oui, une grande dignité. La mort est un événement rare et magnifique qui n'arrive qu'une seule fois dans toute une vie. Il faudrait être stupide pour la craindre et éviter d'y penser. »
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "Oh yeah, we're really dignified. Death is a rare and exquisite event that only happens once in your life. Only an idiot would fear it and avoid thinking about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le serpent rit et se penche vers vous.{/n} « Oh oui, une grande dignité. La mort est un événement rare et magnifique qui n'arrive qu'une seule fois dans toute une vie. Il faudrait être stupide pour la craindre et éviter d'y penser. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Yılan, kahkahayı basıp sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Hiç sorma, öyle asilizdir ki. Hayatta bir kez ölüyoruz. Ancak bir aptal, ölümden korkup nasıl öleceğini düşünmemeye çalışır."
languages.original_text: {n}The snake laughs and leans toward you.{/n} "Oh yeah, we're really dignified. Death is a rare and exquisite event that only happens once in your life. Only an idiot would fear it and avoid thinking about it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yılan kahkahayı basıp sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Hiç sorma, öyle haysiyetliyiz ki. Ölüm, hayatta yalnızca bir kez meydana geliyor. Ender yani. Ancakbir aptal ondan korkup düşüncelerinden çıkarmaya çalışır."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
